parameters: \n<\N[13] with a scar>That's my private property.
\n<\N[12]>QUITE THE PERSPECTIVE LITTLE WORM, ARE YOU NOT.
\n<\N[12]>About the destruction of \C[25]Brassica's\C[0] \C[17]golden idol\C[0], and your group exploring a \C[25]Volcano\C[0].
\n<\N[12]>Apparently, there is also an unusual \C[25]Volcano\C[0] to the \C[7]east\C[0].
\n<\N[12]>One that does not erupt molten lava, but rather frigid ice.
\n<\N[12]>Inside there is an \C[17]amulet\C[0] of my forefathers, the \C[13]Great King Leon\C[0].
\n<\N[12]>Your party has proven worthy of exploring these types of deadly environments.
\n<\N[12]>As such I humbly task you to recover the \C[17]amulet\C[0].
\n<\N[12]>My men and I are preparing for\.\. umm.
\n<\N[12]>For an event, that cannot be disclosed at this moment in time.
\n<\N[12]>Besides, I feel your party has earned the right to fight in the name of your most gracious \C[13]King\C[0].
\n<\N[4]>We better get a reward out of this.
\n<\N[12]>AH HA HA HA GOOD SHOW.\| GOOD SHOW.
\n<\N[12]>Yes my boy, your reward will be quite massive and surprising.
\n<\N[12]>Ahhhh my loyal subjects, it's about time you got back.
\n<\N[2]>Why did you order our families to return home?
\n<\N[12]>I'm sure you have noticed foul creatures appearing across the lands.
\n<\N[12]>I'm afraid, they are the reincarnated vessels of fallen warriors long since past.
\n<\N[11]>While on duty, we noticed a sudden increase of \C[10]Monsters\C[0].
\n<\N[11]>My scout units started reporting grey \C[10]Monsters\C[0] heading towards Brassica.
\n<\N[11]>In retailation we bordened up the village, and then they attacked.
\n<\N[12]>So as you can plainly see we had no opition.
\n<\N[12]>However, there is another matter at hand.
\n<\N[12]>My men witnessed cries from two large creatures in the sky.
\n<\N[12]>They were the twin lords of our ancestors.
\n<\N[12]>You must venture back into the two \C[25]Volcanos\C[0], and destory them.
\n<\N[12]>As compensation we shall protect your village.
\n<\N[3]>We have proven that we can fight.
\n<\N[3]>My Lord, we need strategy and resources.
\n<\N[3]>We can't just risk our lives for a damn \C[17]amulet\C[0].
\n<\N[1]>For a "King" ya ain't much of a leader.
\n<\N[1]>Your just sitting around like some kind of human PIG, while we fight your battles!
\n<\N[1]>If you don't lend us men, we'll just go to \C[25]Brassica\C[0] and protect it ourselves.
\n<\N[1]>You lot can handle the whateva lords.
\n<\N[12]>TAKE HALF MY MEN AND STATION THEM TO LOCKDOWN THIS PUNY VILLAGE.
\n<\N[11]>Im sorry, I have never meet you before.
\n<\N[11]>I have lived in \C[25]Civitatem\C[0] all my life, and I have no time to socialise.
\n<\N[11]>Im sorry, I have never meet you before.
\n<\N[11]>I have lived in \C[25]Civitatem\C[0] all my life, and I have no time to socialise.
\n<\N[12]>You have caused quite the commotion, but all is forgiven.
\n<\N[12]>You have caused quite the commotion, but all is forgiven.
\n<\N[12]>That reward isnt going to be awarding itself.
\n<\N[13]>Im sure youve heard of \C[25]Civitatem\C[0] by now.
\n<\N[13]>Population over 5,000 and still growing, all thanks to \C[13]King Griffins\C[0] superb rule.
\n<\N[13]>I cant wait to return to \C[25]Civitatem\C[0] and roast some pigs on the fire.
\n<\N[13] with a scar>Personally\|, I dont much care for the kingdom, Im only doing this for the \C[17]gold\C[0].
\n<\N[13] with a scar>*sigh* my feet hurt.
\n<\N[13] with cross scar>Ffffffffff, even on duty its always good to do a workout and keep yourself on your toes.
\n<\N[13] with cross scar>Ffffffffff, even on duty its always good to do a workout and keep yourself on your toes.
\n<\N[13] with scratches>Being a soldier isnt as glamorous as it seems.
\n<\N[13] with scratches>Honestly a lot of it is just waiting around until you have to fight for your life and hope you dont die.
\n<\N[13] with scratches>Being a soldier isnt as glamorous as it seems.
\n<\N[13] with scratches>Honestly a lot of it is just waiting around until you have to fight for your life and hope you dont die.
\n<\N[13] with scratches>Wish my mother was here, she always cooked the best pies.
\n<\N[13] with a scar>That's my private property.
\n<\N[13] with a scar>That's my private property.
\n<\N[13] with a scar>That's my private property.
A cabinet full of various spices and wines.
A cabinet full of various spices and wines.
\fi"I have recieved an amazing gift from my servants, a suit of golden armour, tis a shame that I cannot wear it in my state."\fi
\fi"1 rat tail, 5 bushels of wheat, the eye a giant..."\fi
